meaningMnemonic: <kanji>Bean</kanji> <kanji>rot</kanji> is when you take soy beans, let them ferment, and then you make <vocabulary>tofu</vocabulary> out of them! Yep, that's what tofu is. Rotten beans.
readingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word that uses the on'yomi readings of the kanji. You should be able to read this on your own.
